nodes.text: YS-5755 was an R-series astromech droid manufactured by Industrial Automaton. The droid featured in the song "Goola Bukee" by Zano, during which YS-5755 had a solo performance. The droid DJ R-3X praised the R-unit's performance, citing it as the reason for the song's success. In 34 ABY, R-3X played "Goola Bukee" at Oga's Cantina in the town of Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu.

YS-5755's voice appeared in the track "Goola Bukee" at the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. YS-5755 was identified as the featuring artist on the song with the release of the digital album Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Oga's Cantina: R3X's Playlist #1 on September 6, 2019.
